name: context-seed
description: Autonomous project seeder — reads a PRD, maps requirements to packages, installs them in dependency order, delegates design system composition to design-system-seed, and delivers a scaffolded project.
postMessage:
Context Seed v3 installed at .claude/skills/context-seed/SKILL.md

Feed your PRD or describe your project. The skill fetches the live registry, builds an install plan, and executes it.

Design system signals are delegated to design-system-seed for brand-aware composition.

No hardcoded catalog — new templates are picked up automatically from the registry.
